text:
Champions League
Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague: "when the team loses, we look at the coach"
On the eve of the meeting of the fourth day of the Champions League, Ernesto Valverde has notably returned to the difficulties of his team outside.
04 Nov 2019, 18:20 by Charlie Creteur



In front of Levante, Barcelona conceded their third defeat of the season in Liga (3-1) during the 12th day. As a result, critics rained on the performance of Blaugrana led by Ernesto Valverde. "The coach is responsible for the team and when the team loses, we look at the coach," he said. "That's how I guess and that's all." Despite the difficulties of the Catalans especially outside, the former coach of Athletic Bilbao is not worried before the match of the Champions League against Slavia Prague. "When you lose, you have more pressure," he continued. "I think it's good for us because it forces you to react."







The moment of Demb√©l√©?




Ousmane Dembele + 8 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Following the injury to the calf Lu√≠s Suarez, Ousmane Demb√©l√© should have a card to play for the next meetings including the one against Slavia Prague. "Everyone has to find his place, when he plays, try to stay in place," he retorted. "It's the same for Griezmann, Suarez, Piqu√© ... He has to try to maintain himself and not to go away". The message is over!
